title: Person of Interest Gag Reel Season 2
author: Marianna Bonifacio
comment: "Oh my gosh; I'm doing my BEST acting right now!"
Its funny how Michael Emerson still behave like Harold Finch in real life.
i love how when that horn goes off michael turns with his whole body...he can't stop being finch lol
My favourite part would have to be "Jesus can you make the wind stop blowing?"

bwhahaha "Jesus can you make the wind stop blowing" She is clearly saying that to Jim, who of course played Jesus in Passion Of The Christ. That had me in stitches, and he is certainly trying not to burst out laughing :D
